attributes.action: Nationalise all Banks operating in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the banks are making excess money only for the benefits of their own rich shareholders. This money could be better spent being used for the good of all people of the UK. It would also stabilise the current economic crisis. The banks management should also be made responsible for the debts.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
